description:
Ushio is dead. Just as the situation seems bleak, Karikiri and Heine strike. Mio and Hizuru learn about Ushio`s death from Shinpei`s call and head to their respective designated meeting places. However, it is Karikiri who awaits Mio, while Shinpei waits at Hizuru`s designated meeting place.
Source: Disney+
